description: Hogtied presents legendary bondage model Stacy Burke. Stacy is a staple at the Playboy mansion, and is a former girlfriend of Hugh Hefner. She is a member of the "Blond Posse", a group of girls who follow Hugh wherever he goes. Stacy has also starred in many late night movies you would see on Cinemax and such. However today she is a Hogtied girl, with all the rank and privileges it entails. Thanks, Stacy, you were great.
title: Stacy Burke
